akn:content.akn:p:
§ 721. Short title; “person” defined This chapter may be cited as “The Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge Act.” The term “person” as used therein includes an individual, partnership, association, or corporation. (June 7, 1924, ch. 346, §§ 1, 12, 43 Stat. 650, 652; Pub. L. 105–312, title II, § 202(b), Oct. 30, 1998, 112 Stat. 2957.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section is a combination provision, the first sentence being derived from section 1 and the last from section 12, of act June 7, 1924.
Amendments1998—Pub. L. 105–312 substituted “National Wildlife” for “Wild Life”.
